title: 일상 루틴
description: 일상생활의 루틴에 대한 글을 읽고 이해합니다.

passage.text:
My name is David. I am a high school student. Every day, I wake up at 6:30 in the morning.

I eat breakfast with my family at 7 o'clock. We usually eat toast and drink milk. After breakfast, I go to school by bus.

School starts at 8:30. I have six classes every day. My favorite subject is science. I like learning about animals and plants.

After school, I play basketball with my friends. We practice for one hour. Then I go home and do my homework.

In the evening, I have dinner with my family. We talk about our day. After dinner, I study for about two hours. I go to bed at 10 o'clock.
